Name: Dantz's Prize Cows
Step01:
Dantz, a farmer in Hateno Village, is looking
for <clr:0000>acorns<clr:ffff> to mix into his cows' feed so they
can produce his special fresh milk.

He says he could mix more feed if he had <clr:0000>three
acorns<clr:ffff>, but a recent boom in the squirrel
population has made them hard to come by.
Complete:
You gave Dantz the acorns and he gave you
a bottle of fresh milk to express his gratitude.
If you bring him another <clr:0000>three acorns<clr:ffff>, he'd
be willing to make the same trade for more
fresh milk.
